name: Bus Simulator: Crazy Driving
description:
Bus Simulator: Crazy Driving is specially design for driving bus on thrilling sky containers highway and deadly wooden turn ramps. Initiate your driving passion in this impossible bus simulator track game and use special skills in adventurous heavy wheel jumbo impossible tracks game

FEATURES:
* Multiple bus designs and driving animations
* Mid-air stunts and sky-high driving tracks
* Inspiring experience of sky roads driving
* Extreme bus stunts and realistic driving simulation
* Smooth control of big euro trailers
